aboutUs.title: ABOUT US
aboutUs.paragraph1: Master of Mount Wutai personally unlocks millennia of ancient Eastern wisdom, grounded in the I Ching, birth charts, Zi Wei Dou Shu, Plum Blossom I Ching, Golden Key Verses, and the Great Six Yao. Integrating the Five Elements' cycles of generation and restraint with Western astrology, we deeply analyze career, wealth, health, and interpersonal fortunesâ€”revealing opportunities, warning of obstaclesâ€”to help you navigate life's currents and broaden your horizons.
aboutUs.paragraph2: We follow traditional rituals such as consecration and sutra chanting, solemn and proper, infusing each blessed item with pure aspiration, harmonizing body and mind energy, and calming the spirit. With millennia of wisdom, we answer modern life's perplexities, using exclusive blessings to protect a smooth life and flourishing fortune.
